S06pspdut2u:4: yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase//
S06pspdut2u:6: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam//
S06pspdut2u:8: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva//
S06pspdut2u:11: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate/
S06pspdut2u:14: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā//
S06pspdut2u:15: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ/
S06pspdut2u:22: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām//
S06pspdut2u:25: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate/
S06pspdut2u:27: nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na ca kvacana gacchasi/
S06pspdut2u:28: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase//
S06pspdut2u:29: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ/
S06pspdut2u:30: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam//
S06pspdut2u:31: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate/
S06pspdut2u:32: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate//
S06pspdut2u:34: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase//
S06pspdut2u:35: buddhaiḥ prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā/
S06pspdut2u:36: mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ//
S06pspdut2u:38: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase//
S06pspdut2u:39: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām/
S06pspdut2u:41: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ/
S06pspdut2u:42: tvām astutyām api stutvā tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāaḥ/
S06pspdut2u:44: tenās tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam//
S06pspdut2u:45: evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma
S06pspdut2u:46: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ
S06pspdut2u:47: kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyai-
S06pspdut2u:48: r mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāprasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇa-
S06pspdut2u:50: pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair apari-
S06pspdut2u:51: māṇairś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ
S06pspdut2u:53: labdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair alapakair arapagata-
S06pspdut2u:57: r vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyaprati-
S06pspdut2u:65: bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca nara-
S06pspdut2u:66: dattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣa-
S06pspdut2u:67: matinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susamprasthitena ca suvi-
S06pspdut2u:68: krāntavikramiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca
S06pspdut2u:69: anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañju-
S06pspdut2u:70: śriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityokṣiptahastena ca maitre-
S06pspdut2u:71: yeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam pramukhair anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyuta-
S06pspdut2u:73: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā
S06pspdut2u:74: ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma
S06pspdut2u:75: samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ samava-
S06pspdut2u:77: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān samprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya
S06pspdut2u:78: divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot/
S06pspdut2u:81: niyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ/ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṃghābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:82: ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:83: pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt/ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo
S06pspdut2u:84: hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām evaṃ grīvā-
S06pspdut2u:85: yāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:86: cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyādūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyuta-
S06pspdut2u:87: śatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāur a-
S06pspdut2u:88: vabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā loka-
S06pspdut2u:89: dhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ evaṃ dakṣi-
S06pspdut2u:90: ṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:91: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava-
S06pspdut2u:92: s tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tena
S06pspdut2u:93: mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anu-
S06pspdut2u:95: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot/ evakikataś ca
S06pspdut2u:97: trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt/ taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:100_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ {{diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:100_1: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā
S06pspdut2u:101: ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ}} samyak-
S06pspdut2u:103: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā
S06pspdut2u:104: prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa/ yāvat sarvāsu
S06pspdut2u:105: daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavayas tā
S06pspdut2u:106: prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve
S06pspdut2u:108: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa/ yenemaṃ
S06pspdut2u:110: mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smita-
S06pspdut2u:113: padmāny utpannāny abhūvan/ teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇāḥ saṃsthitā-
S06pspdut2u:114: ś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharma-
S06pspdut2u:115: deśanām/ te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu loka-
S06pspdut2u:116: dhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyā-
S06pspdut2u:117: m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu/ evakikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:118: nadīvālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti
S06pspdut2u:119: sma yad uta imām eva ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām/ ye ca sattvā-
S06pspdut2u:120: s tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau/
S06pspdut2u:121: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ
S06pspdut2u:122: nāma samādhiṃ samāpede/ tathārupaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma
S06pspdut2u:124: dhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata/ acalat prācalat
S06pspdut2u:125: saṃprācalat/ avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat/ araṇat prāraṇat
S06pspdut2u:126: saṃprāraṇat/ akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat/ agarjat prāgarjat
S06pspdut2u:127: saṃprāgarjat/ ante unnamati madhye avanamati, madhye unnamati ante
S06pspdut2u:129: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhvartena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre loka-
S06pspdut2u:130: dhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ
S06pspdut2u:131: śūnyā abhūvan/ sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo
S06pspdut2u:132: nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyūtās te sarvae tenaiva prītiprāmodyena
S06pspdut2u:133: manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan/ evaṃ cāturmahārāajikānāṃ
S06pspdut2u:134: devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmita-
S06pspdut2u:136: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anu-
S06pspdut2u:137: smaranti sma/ anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs tenopa-
S06pspdut2u:138: saṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ
S06pspdut2u:139: prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma/ evaṃ pūrvasyṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopa-
S06pspdut2u:140: meṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantā-
S06pspdut2u:141: d daśasu dikṣvaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarve
S06pspdut2u:142: nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan/
S06pspdut2u:143: sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoni-
S06pspdut2u:144: yamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma/ te ca devam anu-
S06pspdut2u:145: ṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam anusmaranti sma/ anusmṛtya ca
S06pspdut2u:146: tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannā-
S06pspdut2u:147: s teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāda-
S06pspdut2u:148: vandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma/
S06pspdut2u:149: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ
S06pspdut2u:150: sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma/ vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān
S06pspdut2u:151: śṛṇvanti sma/ unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma/ vikṣiptacittā
S06pspdut2u:152: ekāgracittā bhavanti sma/ jighatsitāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhavanti sma/
S06pspdut2u:153: tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā bhavanti sma/ rogaspṛṣṭā viagatarogā bhavanti
S06pspdut2u:154: sma/ hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma/ avirahitākuśala-
S06pspdut2u:156: bhavanti sma/ sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma, bhrātṛbhaginī-
S06pspdut2u:158: sevinaś ca bhavanti sma/ brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca
S06pspdut2u:159: sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratlabhante sma tad yathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyāna-
S06pspdut2u:160: samāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatā
S06pspdut2u:161: bhavanti sma/ yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma
S06pspdut2u:162: sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu vīrṇo brahmacaryyāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūte-
S06pspdut2u:164: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva saṃhāsane niṣanaḥ imaṃ trisāhasramahā-
S06pspdut2u:165: sāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma
S06pspdut2u:166: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyā-
S06pspdut2u:167: m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pspdut2u:168: tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate/ tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatā-
S06pspdut2u:169: n abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}} tejasā ca/
S06pspdut2u:170: evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}}
S06pspdut2u:171: tejasā ca/ evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pspdut2u:172: tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}} tejasā ca/
S06pspdut2u:173: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau
S06pspdut2u:174: sattvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa/ atha khalu
S06pspdut2u:176: kṛtvā ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇa-
S06pspdut2u:177: ratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trayastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te
S06pspdut2u:178: taṃ tathāgasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavile-
S06pspdut2u:181: gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/ ye ceha
S06pspdut2u:183: m ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyā-
S06pspdut2u:185: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandha-
S06pspdut2u:187: puṣpais tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma/
S06pspdut2u:189: patākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi
S06pspdut2u:191: m ekaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt/ tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni
S06pspdut2u:192: puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma/ taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhi-
S06pspdut2u:193: ś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata/ tena ca suvarṇa-
S06pspdut2u:194: varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:195: nadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ asmiṃś ca
S06pspdut2u:196: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ
S06pspdut2u:197: devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt/ mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇo
S06pspdut2u:199: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot/
S06pspdut2u:201: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan/ ye
S06pspdut2u:202: ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:203: nadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān
S06pspdut2u:204: tasyāñ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te
S06pspdut2u:205: sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ
S06pspdut2u:206: bhikṣusaṃghena/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:207: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālu-
S06pspdut2u:208: kopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān/ teṣu
S06pspdut2u:209: ca gaṅānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahāloka-
S06pspdut2u:210: dhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikusaṃghena/
S06pspdut2u:211: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
S06pspdut2u:212: tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma
S06pspdut2u:213: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati/ sa imām eva
S06pspdut2u:214: prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati/ atha tatra lokadhātau

S06pspdut2u:1252: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati/
S06pspdut2u:1253: na vedanāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati/ na
S06pspdut2u:1255: na saṃskārān {saṃkleśadharmiṇo vā vyavadānadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati}/
S06pspdut2u:1256: na vijñānam {saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati}/
S06pspdut2u:1257: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ samava-
S06pspdut2u:1258: saratīti samanupaśyati/ na vedanā saṃjñāyāṃ {samavasaratīti samanupaśyati}/ na saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu
S06pspdut2u:1261: na vijñānaṃ dharme {samavasaratīti samanupaśyati}/ na dharmaḥ
S06pspdut2u:1262: kvacid dharme samavasaratīti samanupaśyati/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ na hi kaści-
S06pspdut2u:1263: d dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasarati prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya/ tat kasya hetoḥ/
S06pspdut2u:1264: tathā hi śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpam/ yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā
S06pspdut2u:1265: na sā vedanā/ yā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā/ yā saṃskārāṇāṃ
S06pspdut2u:1266: śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ/ yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānam/ tat kasya
S06pspdut2u:1267: hetoḥ/ tathā hi yā rūpaśūnyatā na sā rūpayati/ yā vedanāśūnyatā na
S06pspdut2u:1268: sā vedayati/ yā saṃjñāśūnyatā na sā saṃjānīte/ yā saṃskāraśūnyatā
S06pspdut2u:1269: na sābhisaṃskāroti/ yā vijñānaśūnyatā na sā vijānāti/ tat kasya
S06pspdut2u:1270: hetoḥ/ tathā hi śāriputra nānyad rūpam anyā śūnyatā/ nānyā śūnyatā anya-
S06pspdut2u:1271: d rūpam/ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam/ nānyā vedanā anyā śūnyatā/
S06pspdut2u:1272: nānyā śūnyatā anyā vedanā/ vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā/ nānyā
S06pspdut2u:1273: saṃjñā anyā śūnyatā/ nānyā śūnyatā anyā saṃjñā/ saṃjñaiva śūnyatā
S06pspdut2u:1274: śūnyataiva saṃjñā/ nānye saṃskārā anyā śūnyatā/ nānyā śūnyatā
S06pspdut2u:1275: anye saṃskārāḥ/ saṃskārā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ/ nānyad
S06pspdut2u:1276: vijñānam anyā śūnyatā/ nānyā śūnyatā anyad vijñānam/ vijñānam eva
S06pspdut2u:1278: śūnyatā śāriputra notpadyate na nirudhyate/ na saṃkliśyate na vyava-
S06pspdut2u:1279: dāyate/ na hīyate na vardhate/ nātītā nāgatā na pratyutpannā/ yā ca
S06pspdut2u:1280: īdṛśī na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ na pṛthivī-
S06pspdut2u:1281: dhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātur nākāśadhātur na vijñānadhātur na cakṣu-
S06pspdut2u:1282: r āyatanaṃ na rūpāyatanaṃ na śrotrāyatanaṃ na śabdāyatanaṃ na ghrāṇāyatanaṃ na
S06pspdut2u:1283: gandhāyatanaṃ na jihvāyatanaṃ na rasāyatanaṃ na kāyāyatanaṃ na spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ na
S06pspdut2u:1284: manaāyatanaṃ na dharmāyatanam/ na cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñāna-
S06pspdut2u:1285: dhātuḥ/ na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ/ na ghrāṇadhātur na
S06pspdut2u:1286: gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ/ na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñāna-
S06pspdut2u:1287: dhātuḥ/ na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātuḥ/ na manodhātur na
S06pspdut2u:1288: dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhatuḥ/ nāvidyotpādo nāvidyānirodhaḥ/ na
S06pspdut2u:1301: na nirodho na mārgo na prāptir nābhisamayo na srotaāpannā na srota-

S06pspdut2u:1303: nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ nārhattvaphalam na pratyekabuddhā na pratyekabodhiḥ
S06pspdut2u:1304: na buddho na bodhiḥ/ evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāra-

S06pspdut2u:1316: na saṃjñāyāṃ yukta {iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati}/ na

S06pspdut2u:1325: na rūpe yukta {iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati}/

S06pspdut2u:1331: na smṛtyupashtāneṣu yukta {iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati}/
S06pspdut2u:1332: na samyakprahāṇeṣu yukta {iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati}/ na ṛddhi-

S06pspdut2u:1342: na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yukta {iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati}/

S06pspdut2u:1346: yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati/ tad anenāpi te śāri-
S06pspdut2u:1347: putra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:1349: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na
S06pspdut2u:1350: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāyogam/ nānimittam ani-
S06pspdut2u:1352: yojayati nāpraṇihitayogam/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi śūnyatā na
S06pspdut2u:1353: yogo nāyogaḥ evam animittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo nāyogaḥ/ evaṃ
S06pspdut2u:1354: yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta
S06pspdut2u:1356: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06pspdut2u:1357: dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām avatarati/ evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati
S06pspdut2u:1358: na viyojayati na vedanāṃ yojayati na viyojayati/ na saṃjñāṃ {yojayati na viyojayati}/
S06pspdut2u:1361: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena {yojayati na viyojayati}/ pūrvā-
S06pspdut2u:1362: ntam eva na samanupaśyati/ na rūpam aparāntena {yojayati na viyojayati}/ aparāntam eva na
S06pspdut2u:1366: na vedanāṃ pūrvāntena {yojayati na viyojayati}/ pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati/ na vedanā-
S06pspdut2u:1367: m aparāntena {yojayati na viyojayati} aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati/ na vedanāṃ pratyutpannena
S06pspdut2u:1368: yojayati na viyojayati pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati/

S06pspdut2u:1379: na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati/

S06pspdut2u:1383: na vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati/}}
S06pspdut2u:1384: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na

S06pspdut2u:1387: ntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati/ na pūrvāntam aparāntena vā pratyutpa-
S06pspdut2u:1388: nnena vā yojayati/ adhvaśūnyatām upādāya evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāri-

S06pspdut2u:1391: yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvākārajñatām atītena yojayati/

S06pspdut2u:1395: yojayati/ pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati kathaṃ pratyutpannena sarvākāra-
S06pspdut2u:1396: jñatāṃ yojayati/ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñā-

S06pspdut2u:9543: dhāraṇīmukhānīmāni/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi bhagavan {bodhisattvo} mahāsattvaḥ
S06pspdut2u:9544: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni skandha-
S06pspdut2u:9549: saṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na {samanupaśyati}/ tat kasya hetoḥ/
S06pspdut2u:9550: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam/ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ
S06pspdut2u:9551: yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad a-
S06pspdut2u:9554: yo śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya yo manaso 'nutpādo na tad mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/
S06pspdut2u:9555: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam/
S06pspdut2u:9556: yo śabdasya gandhasya rasasya spraṣṭavyasya yo dharmasyānutpādo na sa dharma iti hi dharmaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/
S06pspdut2u:9557: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tad cakṣurvijñānam/
S06pspdut2u:9558: yo śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tad manovijñānam iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/
S06pspdut2u:9559: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā/
S06pspdut2u:9560_0: yo śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06pspdut2u:9560_1: anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
S06pspdut2u:9561: yo bhagavan adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na tad adhyātmaśūnyatā/
S06pspdut2u:9562_0: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā mahāśūnyatāyāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ
S06pspdut2u:9562_3: bhāvaśūnyatāyā abhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā yaḥ parabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo
S06pspdut2u:9562_4: na sā parabhāvaśūnyatā iti hi parabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /}}

S06pspdut2u:9957: tac ca sanniśritaṃ parityajati/ tasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ dadāmi eṣa parigṛhṇīte
S06pspdut2u:9958: idaṃ dānam ahaṃ nirmatsaraḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajāmi/ ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi/
S06pspdut2u:9959: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi/ aham etad dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā
S06pspdut2u:9960: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmi tac cānupalambhayogena/ anena
S06pspdut2u:9961: ca dānena dānaphalena ca sarvasattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantu anupādāya
S06pspdut2u:9962: parinirvāntu/ sa tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti/ katamais tribhir yad uta ātma-
S06pspdut2u:9963: saṃjñayā parasaṃjñayā dānasaṃjñayā ca ebhis tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti// [iyam ucyate
S06pspdut2u:9965: tathā hi {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} lokato na calati noccalati na saṃkrāmati/
S06pspdut2u:9967: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ/ tatra katamā
S06pspdut2u:9968: trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ/ iha {bodhisattvo} mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat nātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakaṃ
S06pspdut2u:9974: punar aparam {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} {bodhisattvo} mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na sarvasattvebhya-
S06pspdut2u:9979: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati/ na ca bodhim upalabhate// [iyam ucyate lokottarā
S06pspdut2u:9981: kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti/ tathā hy {āyuṣman} {śāriputra}
S06pspdut2u:9982: lokāc calati uccalati saṃkrāmati/ tena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāra-
S06pspdut2u:9983: miteti/ evaṃ śīla{pāramitā} kṣānti{pāramitā} vīrya{pāramitā} dhyāna{pāramitā}/
S06pspdut2u:9987: dānaṃ dadāti upalambhaniśrito mātsaryacittaṃ mayā nigrahītavyam iti/ tac cātma-
S06pspdut2u:9988: sattvadānasaṃjñāniśritaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajati bāhyaṃ vā ādhyātmikaṃ vā
S06pspdut2u:9989: vastu upāttaṃ vā anupāttaṃ vā nāsti kiñcid yat na parityajati/ tac ca kuśala-
S06pspdut2u:9990: mūlaṃ bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhaniśritaḥ/ sa
S06pspdut2u:9991: śīlaṃ sevate dhūtaguṇapratiṣṭhitaḥ/ kāyavākcittopalambhaniśritas tāṃś ca daśakuśalān
S06pspdut2u:9992: karmapathān sevamānaḥ ātmadṛṣṭyāṃ sattvadṛṣṭyāṃ kuśaladṛṣṭyāṃ niśritaḥ
S06pspdut2u:9993: bodhim upalabhya sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tac copala-
S06pspdut2u:9994: mbhena/ ātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃsayati sa sarvasattvānāṃ duṣkṛtāni kṣamate/
S06pspdut2u:9995: ātmasattvakṣāntidṛṣṭiniśritas tac ca kuśalam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāma-
S06pspdut2u:9996: yati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogena/ sa vīryam ārabhate kāyam upalambha-
S06pspdut2u:9997: mānaḥ cittam {upalambhamānaḥ} puṇyasambhāram {upalambhamāno} jñānasambhāram {upalambhamāna} ātmānam {upalambhamāno} bodhim {upalambhamānaḥ}
S06pspdut2u:9998: tena ca vīryārambhena manyate/ tac ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogenā-
S06pspdut2u:9999: nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati/ sa maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṃ bhāvayati
S06pspdut2u:10000: dhyānasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca tā āsvādayati/ tā āsvādayan
S06pspdut2u:10001: manyate/ sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni ca kuśalamūlāni upalambhadṛṣṭiko bodhaye pari-
S06pspdut2u:10003: sa śūnyatāṃ bhāvayan rūpaṃ śūnyam iti upalabhate/ {vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ}/ vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti
S06pspdut2u:10004: upalabhate/ yāvad buddhabodhiṃ copalabhate upalambhayogena/ tāni kuśalamūlāni
S06pspdut2u:10005: sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati/ taṃ
S06pspdut2u:10006: copalambhayogena/ sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayaty upalambhayogena ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca
S06pspdut2u:10007: puṇyam anumodate/ ātmanaś ca parasya cārthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarvabuddhān adhyeṣayate/
S06pspdut2u:10008: anupāyena triḥkṛtvaḥ puṇyaṃ sarvajñatāyai pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā//
S06pspdut2u:10020: bodhāya sarvakuśalamūlāni cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati nirviśeṣa-
S06pspdut2u:10023: kena kāraṇena laukikī/ loko yābhir bhavati/ lokaṃ vā yābhir nivartayati/
S06pspdut2u:10024: lokena vā yāḥ samāḥ/ lokāya vā yābhir dīyate/ lokāt vā yābhir niḥsarati/
S06pspdut2u:10025: lokasya vā yā bhavāya/ loke vā bhavā yās tā laukikyaḥ/
S06pspdut2u:10026: tatra katamā lokottarā/ loko yābhir uttārayati/ lokaṃ yābhir uttārayati/
S06pspdut2u:10027: lokena vā yābhir uttāryate/ ālokāya vā yā bhavati/ lokāt vā yābhir niḥ-
S06pspdut2u:10028: sarati/ lokasya vā yā uttaraṇāya/ loke vā yā uttarās tā lokottarā iti/
S06pspdut2u:10029: evaṃ hy {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} {bodhisattvo} mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ
S06pspdut2u:10034: mārgaḥ/ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni

S06pspdut2u:10036: adhyātma{śūnyatā} bahirdhā{śūnyatā} adhyātmabahirdhā{śūnyatā} yāvad abhāvasvabhāva{śūnyatā} sarvasamādhayaḥ
S06pspdut2u:10037: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamā-
S06pspdut2u:10038: pattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśā-
S06pspdut2u:10039: veṇikā buddhadharmā mahākaruṇā ayam ucyate {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} {bodhisattvasya} mahāsattvasya
S06pspdut2u:10041: {śāriputra} āha/ katamasyā {āyuṣman subhūte} pāramitāyā ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ/
S06pspdut2u:10042: {subhūtir} āha/ prajñāpāramitāyā {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ/ tat kasya
S06pspdut2u:10043: hetoḥ/ tathā hy {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ

S06pspdut2u:10047: mitāyām {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā

S06pspdut2u:10050: syante/ ye 'py etarhi {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyak-

S06pspdut2u:10054: mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṃkṣāyitatvaṃ na bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ veditavyam etad {āyuṣman}

S06pspdut2u:10059: vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena manasikāreṇeti/ evaṃ saty {āyuṣman} {subhūte} sarvasattvā api
S06pspdut2u:10060: bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hy {āyuṣman} {subhūte} sarvasattvā
S06pspdut2u:10062: {subhūtir} āha/ sādhu sādhu {āyuṣman} {śāriputra} upālapsye tvāṃ artha evāyuṣmatā
S06pspdut2u:10063: śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ sattvāsattay{āyuṣman}

S06pspdut2u:10076: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate shūtaye sādhukāram adāt/ sādhu sādhu subhūte/

S06pspdut2u:10080: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāparivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe
S06pspdut2u:10081: trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampito yāvat pūrvottaradakṣiṇa-
